participant_1.background:
I want a home that is quiet and private, with plenty of space for my vintage cars.
i work as a physical therapist , and my wife is a school nurse.
i currently work at target.
i likw to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
My family is my everything, and I want to find someone who is willing to share that with me.

participant_2.background:
I drive a convertible because it gives me the freedom to enjoy the open air and my ice cream.
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
i have a big family.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

content.text: not much just hanging out, how about you?
same here, i'm trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
oh that's tough, i hope you're doing well
i'm doing alright, i'm trying to figure out what works for me
i'm sure you'll figure it out, what's your favorite ice cream flavor?
mint chocolate chip! what about you?
i love chocolate chip cookie dough!
i'm a big fan of ice cream, i have a whole freezer full of it.
me too! i love making homemade ice cream.
that's awesome, i've never made homemade ice cream before.
it's really easy, you should try it sometime.
i will, i'm sure it's delicious
it is! i love making different flavors.
